AI Description: PyGenomeViz is a Python library for creating interactive, publication-quality visualizations of genomics data. It provides a user-friendly and customizable platform for visualizing various genomic features and their associated data.
Core Features: Interactive Visualizations Of Genomics Data, Publication-Quality Graphics, Customizable Plots & Annotations, Support For Various Genomic Data Formats
General Tags: Genomics, Data Visualization, Python Library, Bioinformatics
